snippet: Delta Air Lines on Wednesday said it would put the brakes on its expansion of flight capacity in 2016 in a move to fill more planes and sell more seats at higher fares.
abstract: Delta Air Lines announces halt to its expansion of its flight capacity in 2016 in order to fill more planes and charge higher fares for more seats.
lead_paragraph: Delta Air Lines on Wednesday said it would put the brakes on its expansion of flight capacity in 2016 in a move to fill more planes and sell more seats at higher fares.

headline.main: Delta Says It Will Keep Flight Capacity Growth Flat
headline.print_headline: Delta Says It Will Keep Flight Capacity Growth Flat
